org.lwjgl.system.libffi

Class FFIType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.system.libffi.FFIType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class FFIType
extends Struct
    Contains information about a libffi type.

    ffi_type members

    MemberTypeDescription
    sizesize_tset by libffi; you should initialize it to zero.
    alignmentunsigned shortset by libffi; you should initialize it to zero.
    typeunsigned shortfor a structure, this should be set to LibFFI.FFI_TYPE_STRUCT.
    elementsffi_type *a null-terminated array of pointers to ffi_type objects. There is one element per field of the struct.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FFIType

        public FFIType(long struct)
        Creates a FFIType instance at the specified memory address.

      • FFIType

        public FFIType(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a FFIType instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
